alert.note: Alert for Appling; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 4:07PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN COFFEE... NORTHWESTERN BACON...JEFF DAVIS AND APPLING COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 407 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Snipesville to near Hazlehurst to Plant Hatch. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Baxley, Hazlehurst, Graham, Surrency, Plant Hatch, West Green, Snipesville, Denton, and Pine Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
